TermDefinition.DefinitionText: Acid that is released into the stomach from glands in the stomach wall. It helps digest food. Gastric acid is made of hydrochloric acid.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Ácido que liberan las glándulas de la pared del estómago. Ayuda a digerir los alimentos. El ácido gástrico se compone de ácido clorhídrico.
